title: The New Elektron Song Mode Is Absurd
description:
The Elektron Syntakt, Digitakt, and Digitone got a song mode in the new firmware. I'm gonna do terrible things to it.
The song is here: https://fanlink.to/h3dD
The vocal pedal is the TC Helicon Perform VE: https://amzn.to/3SvDTR3
Get a Syntakt
At Patchwerks: https://shrsl.com/3n3x6
At Perfect Circuit: https://bit.ly/3vBB7An

00:00 song mode walkthrough
06:31 musical performance dedicated to adam levine
